projects.title: Notes App
description: This app allows users to create, edit, and delete notes, as well as format text using Markdown syntax.
Used additional libraries such as React-mde, React-split, nanoid and Showdown to build the app.
Utilized local storage to enable users to save and access their notes offline.

projects.title: Meme Generator
description: Developed a front-end web application using React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Integrated the imgFlip API to allow users to generate memes using pre-defined templates.
Implemented features such as selecting a template and adding custom text to the meme.
